(ROOT
  (SQ (VBZ Is)
    (NP (PRP it))
    (NP
      (NP
        (NP (JJ just)
          (NX
            (NX (FW me))
            (CC or)))
        (SBAR
          (S
            (VP (VBZ is)
              (ADVP (RB there))
              (ADVP (RB really))
              (NP
                (NP (PDT such) (DT a) (JJ disproportionate) (NN number))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (NNP intimidating) (NNP Sushi) (NNP Chefs))))))))
      (PP (IN in)
        (NP (DT the) (NN world))))
    (. ?)))


cop(me-4, Is-1)
nsubj(me-4, it-2)
amod(me-4, just-3)
root(ROOT-0, me-4)
cc(me-4, or-5)
cop(number-12, is-6)
advmod(number-12, there-7)
advmod(number-12, really-8)
predet(number-12, such-9)
det(number-12, a-10)
amod(number-12, disproportionate-11)
rcmod(me-4, number-12)
prep(number-12, of-13)
nn(Chefs-16, intimidating-14)
nn(Chefs-16, Sushi-15)
pobj(of-13, Chefs-16)
prep(me-4, in-17)
det(world-19, the-18)
pobj(in-17, world-19)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP am) (RB not)
      (ADJP (JJ sure))
      (SBAR (IN if)
        (S
          (NP (PRP it))
          (VP (VBZ is)
            (ADVP (RB just))
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN language) (NN barrier))
              (CC or)
              (NP (DT the) (NN fact)))
            (SBAR (IN that)
              (S
                (NP (PRP they))
                (VP (VBP are)
                  (VP (VBG holding)
                    (NP (DT a) (JJ sharp) (NN knife))
                    (PP (RB just) (IN within)
                      (S
                        (VP (VBG stabbing)
                          (NP (NN range)))))))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(sure-4, I-1)
cop(sure-4, am-2)
neg(sure-4, not-3)
root(ROOT-0, sure-4)
mark(barrier-11, if-5)
nsubj(barrier-11, it-6)
cop(barrier-11, is-7)
advmod(barrier-11, just-8)
det(barrier-11, the-9)
nn(barrier-11, language-10)
advcl(sure-4, barrier-11)
cc(barrier-11, or-12)
det(fact-14, the-13)
conj(barrier-11, fact-14)
mark(holding-18, that-15)
nsubj(holding-18, they-16)
aux(holding-18, are-17)
ccomp(barrier-11, holding-18)
det(knife-21, a-19)
amod(knife-21, sharp-20)
dobj(holding-18, knife-21)
advmod(within-23, just-22)
prep(holding-18, within-23)
pcomp(within-23, stabbing-24)
dobj(stabbing-24, range-25)

  (S (CC but)
    (NP (PRP I))
    (ADVP (RB often))
    (VP (VBP find)
      (S
        (NP (PRP myself))
        (VP (VBG having)
          (S
            (VP (TO to)
              (VP (VB put)
                (PP (IN on)
                  (NP (PRP$ my) (JJS best) (NN behavior)))
                (SBAR (IN in) (NN order)
                  (S
                    (VP (TO to)
                      (VP (VB eat)
                        (PP (IN at)
                          (NP (JJ certain) (NNP Sushi) (NNS joints)))))))))))))
    (. .)))

  (S
    (S
      (NP (NNP Hisato-san))
      (VP (VBD told)
        (NP (PRP me))
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (PRP he))
            (VP (VBD had)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB be)
                    (VP (VBN brought)

                        (NP
                          (QP (JJ several) (NNS times))))

                        (NP
                          (NP (DT a) (NN friend))
                          (PP (IN in)
                            (NP (DT the) (JJ first) (NN year)))))))))

                        (VP (TO to)
                          (VP (VB make)

      (NP (PRP it))
      (VP (VBD was)

        (PP (IN after)

          (S
            (NP (DT the) (NN Chef))

                    (NP (PRP him))))))))))
    (. !)))

  (S

      (NP (DT The) (JJ tiny) (NN restaurant))

            (NP (NN space))
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP (RB maybe) (CD 10) (NNS persons)))))))

    (. .)))

    (. .)))

          (NP (DT the)
            (NX
              (NX (NNS bells))
              (CC and)
              (NX (NNS whistles))))
          (, ,))))))


root(ROOT-0, By-1)
pcomp(By-1, cutting-2)
advmod(cutting-2, out-3)
dep(out-3, all-4)
det(bells-6, the-5)
dobj(cutting-2, bells-6)
cc(bells-6, and-7)
conj(bells-6, whistles-8)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (NNP Chef))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (ADJP (JJ able)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB present)
              (NP
                (NP (RB just) (DT the)
                  (ADJP (RBS most) (JJ important))
                  (NN part))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (DT the) (NNP Sushi)))))))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(able-3, Chef-1)
cop(able-3, is-2)
root(ROOT-0, able-3)
aux(present-5, to-4)
xcomp(able-3, present-5)
advmod(part-10, just-6)
det(part-10, the-7)
advmod(important-9, most-8)
amod(part-10, important-9)
dobj(present-5, part-10)
prep(part-10, of-11)
det(Sushi-13, the-12)
pobj(of-11, Sushi-13)

  (S
    (VP (VB viz)

    (NP (PRP$ Our) (JJ Omakase) (NN lunch))
    (VP (VBZ meal)
      (SBAR
        (WHNP (WDT which))
        (S
          (VP (VBD included)
            (NP (NN otoro))))))
    (, ,)))

(ROOT
  (S
    (NP
      (NP
        (NP (CD two) (NNS servings))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NNP Uni))))
      (CC and)
      (NP (JJ enough) (JJ chunky) (NN sushi)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB fill)
              (NP (DT the) (NN tummy)))))))
    (VP (VBD came)
      (PRT (RP up))
      (PP (TO to)
        (NP (NNP $))))))
